sentence.Network_en: Mr Jackson had a natural constituency among American blacks.
sentence.Network_cn: 杰克逊先生在美国黑人中拥有自发的支持。

sentence.Network_en: The constituency I live in is a safe Labour seat.
sentence.Network_cn: 我居住的选区是工党的稳得席位。

sentence.Network_en: In France, farmers are a powerful political constituency.
sentence.Network_cn: 在法国，农场主是强有力的政党支持群体。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 一些翻译~（转的~） ... consensus （意见等）一致，同意 constituency 全体选民 constituent Assembly 立宪会议，国民代表大会.

list.abs: 2. 土壤被复soil constituent 土壤成分soil creep 土壤蠕动
英语翻译-心理学专业词汇英语翻译 ... immediate cause 近因 immediate constituent 直接成分 immediate experience 直接经验.
新总统宣布今年十月廿三日选举制宪议会（Constituent Assembly）。换句话说，要先修宪法，再选新总统。
天然药化词汇英汉对照 ... 化学成分 chemical constituent 有效成分 effective constituent 主成分 main constituent.

entry.tran: (选举议员或政府代表的)选区
entry.def: A constituency is an area for which someone is elected as the representative in a parliament or government.

entry.tran: (政党或政治家的)支持者群体，拥护者群体
entry.def: A particular constituency is a section of society that may give political support to a particular party or politician.

example.ex: Mr Jackson had a natural constituency among American blacks...
example.tran: 杰克逊先生在美国黑人中拥有自发的支持。

example.ex: In France, farmers are a powerful political constituency.
example.tran: 在法国，农场主是强有力的政党支持群体。

means.word_mean: 1. the body of voters who elect a representative for their area

auth_sentence.content: The people of your former constituency are very desperate.

auth_sentence.content: That makes the Cuban exiles a pretty crucial constituency.

sentences.en: Our constituency covers the city’s poorest areas.
sentences.cn: 我们的选区包括该城市最贫困的地区。

means.word_mean: (政客或政党的)支持者, 赞助者

sentences.en: Big business is his most important constituency.
sentences.cn: 大企业是他最重要的支持者。
